Name: Panopticus Wizard
Traits: Dwarven Resilience. The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage. Spellcasting. The Dwarf is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield
Actions: Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
